scenes.title: Ken's Leverage
scenes.outline: Mickey meets with Ken in Area 52 basement. Ken shows him satellite imagery of Vance's territory and explains the surveillance mission. Mickey recognizes the leverage Ken is applying through the dojo photos—subtle manipulation using geographic distance (Vegas 160 miles away) and Mickey's attachments. Ken assigns the mission with calculated pressure.

scenes.title: First Conversation at Area 52
scenes.outline: Mickey and Noni's first conversation after arriving at Area 52. Tension over their captivity, mutual suspicion about motives, but underlying connection through The Line. They circle each other verbally, neither admitting dependence. Power dynamics shift as Mickey tries to maintain distance while The Line pulls them together. Noni reads his patterns; he resents and craves it.

scenes.title: First Bi-location into Vance's Territory
scenes.outline: Mickey bi-locates into Vance's territory for reconnaissance. He experiences the optimized environment's sterile efficiency—every inefficiency eliminated, suffering reduced to zero through mathematical precision. Maintains connection to analog body at Area 52 while navigating the quantum space. Noni provides interpretive support through morphic resonance from distance. Mickey observes Vance's citizens: optimized, content, but something missing. The contrast between authentic chaos and sterile efficiency.
